about_the_game:
40 Characters from a variety of Indiegames
In Ultimate Indie Racing, you can choose between 40 different Indie Legends. The game is still early in development, so the lineup will fill over time. You can see the participating Characters here:




Tracks inspired by Indiegames
The Game will have 10 Unique Tracks and 10 additional Race-Tracks, which are inspired by some of the participating Indiegames.

Play against your Friends!
The Game has Online (2-12 competing Players) and Local (2-4 competing Players Splitscreen) Multiplayer and you can even join people from all over the world. You can also talk and write with the People in your Lobby via the Voice and Text-Chat.

Become the best Player!
There is an Online Leaderboard for each Map. In the Time Race Mode, you can compete with other Players from all over the world!

Features in the Game
-> Voice and Text Chat
-> Local Splitscreen Multiplayer
-> Online Servers
-> 40+ Characters to Race
-> Online Leaderboard
